 sorry about my dramatic pause, I'll answer the rest of my posts later.



=
Megaton takes a quick look around the battlefield, the sides go at it fierc=
ely, Predacon vs. Predacon and not a hint of who's on who's side, he recall=
ed the former battle. The great Dragon decided to take measures in hand and=
 pick a target. Megaton growled as his wings created tornado force winds di=
rected at Goldeneye and whoevers in the air nearby."I rule the sky and only=
 I decide who flies in it." A maniacle laugh escaped him from deep within, =
he was going to enjoy this fight.
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: J=
P3884@... 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Tuesday, January 02, 2001 =
9:55 AM
  Subject: Re: Stage one (finished)


       Megatron cruises to th=
e scene, behinde him are Marine, Pheniox, 
  Jackle, Gremlin, and Megaton. =
He see's the attack...and the Energonians. 
        "Ominous Prime? He's re=
turned? This is a rather interesting turn of 
  events, yes." Megatron says=
, as he picks up speed to get a shot at Killfest. 
        He see's him thr=
ow Aerostreak as if he were a toy...and then blast him 
  with two missles.=
 Megatron brought his dino-arm shoulder blasters online, and 
  fired at Ki=
llfest. "If you want revenge, Killfest, I suggest you get it while 
  you c=
an! Yes!" 

        Tankkor drives as the two missle burst behinde him, sen=
ding him 
  stumbling forward a bit. He turns to see the reinforcements hav=
e arrived. At 
  least it brings a little relief. He raises his arm back at=
 Endbringer, and 
  begins to shoot off plasma blast after plasma blast at =
him. 

        Akron is sent flying backward from the shot, but quickly get=
s up as 
  the energy from the shot rushes through her body like a jolt of =
energy. "Come 
  on, big boy. Lets get tough!" She says, and, taking out he=
r energon riffle, 
  begins to fire off shots at his face. 

        Putnam=
 is hit by Goldeneye, but flies up above her and kicks hard. 
  "Give me th=
e vermine! I swear youre going to regreat this...." He says, and 
  brandis=
hes a glowing blue fist at the bird. 


        eGroups Sponsor
